title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: July 24, 2023, 07:12:17 PMLast edit: August 02, 2023, 06:55:58 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Ballet has brought the Litecoin wallet back to their store to celebrate Litecoin's 3rd halving.The wallet is the standard REAL series Stainless Steel wallet but will be inscribed with "Celebrating Litecoin's Third Halving -- August 2023" on the back of the cardIf interested, leave your name and qty desired. Example: MoparMiningLLC - 2COST: $30   --- The wallets are on the site for the standard $35 - I will be buying them in bulk and get them for $30 each (buying 10 packs)PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esCan also pay via Lightning if your wallet supports LN addresses: moparmining@walletofsatoshi.comif you get a pm to pay any other way - ignore it, it will not be from me.SHIPPING: Can be done directly by me or item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.Shipping will be done at cost - the benefit is when consolidating with other items from me or consolidating with minerjones.
